title: Bookjacket Design, 1959–60
medium: Offset lithograph on white wove paper
inscribed: Imprinted at center, on headgear: edited by; on the face (like a moustache: Saul Bellow and Keith Botsford; and at lower left on image:" we will now discuss in a little more detail the struggle for existance."- Darwin; at top left corner: Meridian Books 1960
provenance: Gift of Tamar Cohen and Dave Slatoff, New York, NY
creditline: Gift of Tamar Cohen and Dave Slatoff
description: Black and white photographic image of a three quarter frontal view of a stone sculpture.  Text superimposed over image on headgear, across face and at lower left on image. Title of book appears in 'Playbill' type at top of sheet.

tombstone.epitaph:
Bookjacket Design, 1959–60.
1959–60. Offset lithograph on white wove paper. Gift of Tamar Cohen and Dave Slatoff. 1993-31-37.
